short_summary: The Department of National Defence requires accommodations and meal services for cadets aged 16-18 and 2 adults.
description: The Department of National Defence, Regional Cadet Support Unit (Pacific) has a requirement for accommodations and meal services for 16 cadets aged 16-18 and two adults from July 2 through August 19, 2023, at a location within 20 km of the Kamloops Airport (YKA).
full_summary:
## Government Tender for Accommodations and Meal Services ​​​​

### Solicitation Number
WS4036592363

### Title
Accommodations and Meal Services

### Description
The Department of National Defence, Regional Cadet Support Unit (Pacific) invites proponents to submit a proposal for accommodations and meal services for 16 cadets aged 16-18 and two adults from July 2 to August 19, 2023, inclusive. The services will be required at a location within 20 km of the Kamloops Airport (YKA).

### Notice Details
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Publication Date**: June 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: June 23, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Pacific Time)

### Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 2, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 19, 2023

### Contact Information
Adrianne Dunsmore
SPAC/PSPC
adrianne.dunsmore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

### End User Entity
Department of National Defence (DND)
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
